schema.title: Schema for architect.yml. See: https://docs.architect.io/reference/architect-yml

name.errorMessage: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32
name.description: Globally unique friendly reference to the component. must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

description.description: A human-readable description of the component. This will be rendered when potential consumers view the component so that they know what it should be used for.

keywords.description: Additional search terms to be used when the component is indexed so that others can find it more easily.

author.description: The name or handle of the author of the component as a developer contact.

homepage.description: The url that serves as the informational homepage of the component (i.e. a github repo).

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain alphanumeric character ([a-z0-9A-Z]), could contain dashes (-), underscores (_), and alphanumerics between.

secrets.description: A map of named, configurable fields for the component. If a component contains properties that differ across environments (i.e. environment variables), you'll want to capture them as secrets. Specifying a primitive value here will set the default secret value. For more detailed configuration, specify a SecretDefinitionSpec

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain alphanumeric character ([a-z0-9A-Z]), could contain dashes (-), underscores (_), and alphanumerics between.

anyOf.description: A map of named, configurable outputs for the component. Outputs allow components to expose configuration details that should be shared with consumers, like API keys or notification topic names.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain alphanumeric character ([a-z0-9A-Z]), could contain dashes (-), underscores (_), and alphanumerics between.

outputs.description: A map of named, configurable outputs for the component. Outputs allow components to expose configuration details that should be shared with consumers, like API keys or notification topic names.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

anyOf.description: A database represents a stateful service powered by one of several supported database engines.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

databases.description: A database represents a stateful service powered by one of several supported database engines.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

anyOf.description: A Service represents a non-exiting runtime (e.g. daemons, servers, etc.). Each service is independently deployable and scalable. Services are 1:1 with a docker image.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

services.description: A Service represents a non-exiting runtime (e.g. daemons, servers, etc.). Each service is independently deployable and scalable. Services are 1:1 with a docker image.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

anyOf.description: A set of named recurring and/or exiting runtimes (e.g. crons, schedulers, triggered jobs) included with the component. Each task will run on its specified schedule and/or be triggerable via the Architect CLI. Tasks are 1:1 with a docker image.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

tasks.description: A set of named recurring and/or exiting runtimes (e.g. crons, schedulers, triggered jobs) included with the component. Each task will run on its specified schedule and/or be triggerable via the Architect CLI. Tasks are 1:1 with a docker image.

errorMessage.pattern: must be an interpolation ref ex. $__arc__{{ secrets.example }}

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

dependencies.description: A key-value set of dependencies with an empty value. Reference each dependency by component name (e.g. `cloud: {}`)

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

anyOf.description: A set of named gateways that broker access to the services inside the component. All network traffic within a component is locked down to the component itself, unless included in this interfaces block. An interface represents a front-door to your component, granting access to upstream callers.

errorMessage.additionalProperties: must contain only lower alphanumeric and single hyphens in the middle; max length 32

interfaces.description: A set of named gateways that broker access to the services inside the component. All network traffic within a component is locked down to the component itself, unless included in this interfaces block. An interface represents a front-door to your component, granting access to upstream callers.
